T206 Common Sale:

Free s/h; Payment:  Paypal gift preferred; Paypal goods please add 3%.  Check/MO fine; “I’ll take it” will take precedent over ongoing correspondences.

PM OK but much prefer:

Correspondence to – [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

The following commons are fairly consistent (imo :rolleyes:), so I'll keep pricing simple:

1 card – 31 each
2 – 4  cards – 29 each
5+ cards – 27 each

Notes:  Seymour/throw has tear; Sharpe is trimmed;  Sweet Caporal Williams is Factory 25, others are 30.
